ValidationRule.description: For IHG IMT properties, the property code must be 5 characters and not contain any numbers
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( LEN( Property_Code__c ) <> 5, CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "1"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "2"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "3"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "4"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "5"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "6"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "7"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "8"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "9"), CONTAINS(Property_Code__c, "0")), RecordType.Name = 'InterContinental Hotels Group' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The property code must be 5 characters only and cannot contain numbers
